channel.title: Scam Server! No one fall for it (couldn't find right place to post)
channel.description:
Please for heavens sake dont be silly to join the server "=Pwange PK-real ReWaRdS!= "...
The description say;
The fastest, soon to be most popular PK server on moparscape.
=================INFO=================== -Pk in wildy, to earn REAL rs items -When you PK someone, a reward will be automticly wired to your REAL rs account through my new script -Be sure to use your REAL username and password, unless the items CANNOT be sent to your account! -Prizes periodicly increase in value, starting at full addy, and going all the way to Santa Hat! -Enjoy!
In other words... Once you log in using your real rs account information your account details are recorded and he will hack your accounts. Do NOT join this server.... If there are any admins or anything that can do something about that to prevent this guy from hacking please do asap.
Regards.... Ben Watson

item.title: Scam Server! No one fall for it (couldn't find right place to post)
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It’s obvious. The staff have said it several times. DO NOT use your real runescape account name and password on a moparscape server as this is how people get hacked. It’s the same thing with your forum name and password, don’t use it on moparscape servers. The most recent hacks have been regarding this. If you think a server could possibly harm someone, please PM a G Mod or admin with all the information. They can remove the server from the status page.

Read full topic
item.source: Scam Server! No one fall for it (couldn't find right place to post)

item.title: Scam Server! No one fall for it (couldn't find right place to post)
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

Yes. Just like the scam “Runescape 3 Beta” Ive gone onto some of those sites for fun, typed in a random pass “They have a web client” And said it wasnt real “It emailed it to them obviously” And some key logger programs.

Read full topic

Please for heavens sake dont be silly to join the server "=Pwange PK-real ReWaRdS!= "…

The description say;

The fastest, soon to be most popular PK server on moparscape.

=================INFO===================
-Pk in wildy, to earn REAL rs items
-When you PK someone, a reward will be automticly
wired to your REAL rs account through my new
script
-Be sure to use your REAL username and password,
unless the items CANNOT be sent to your account!
-Prizes periodicly increase in value, starting at
full addy, and going all the way to Santa Hat!
-Enjoy!

In other words… Once you log in using your real rs account information your account details are recorded and he will hack your accounts. Do NOT join this server… If there are any admins or anything that can do something about that to prevent this guy from hacking please do asap.

Regards…
Ben Watson
